nodes.text: Hobi Rann was a male Human merchant who ran a shop known as Hobi Rann's Fine Imported Goods at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY. The shop was located on Market Row, a commercial corridor in the Port Town district of the mining colony Cloud City, which floated in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin. Rann sold cheap and colorful goods imported from across the galaxy.

Hobi Rann was first mentioned in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. He is listed as a merchant that players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
